ComicInfo.Summary:
First merged issue of 2000AD and Starlord. Two strips from 2000AD (Judge Dredd and Flesh) and joined by the top stories from the cancelled Starlord (Ro-Busters and Strontium Dog).
Cover: Dave Gibbons (the stars of 2000AD and Starlord)
Judge Dredd - Crime and Punishment (John Wagner - Brian Bolland Tom Frame)Ro-Busters - Death on the Orient Express! (part 1) (Pat Mills - Dave Gibbons)Flesh - book two (part 1) (Geoffrey Miller - Massimo Belardinelli -Jack Potter)Strontium Dog - The Galaxy Killers (part 1) (John Wagner - Carlos Ezquerra - Peter Knight)
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-21 01:16:30. [Issue ID 125257]
